sentences.en: As a consequence, structured finance had remained a niche and highly bespoke practice throughout the 1990 s.
sentences.cn: 因此,上世界90年代期间, 结构化金融始终是高度定制化的利基业务.

sentences.en: Bespoke suits are created by highly skilled tailors and artisans to fit your every inch.
sentences.cn: 定做的西装是由技艺高超的裁缝和手艺人按照你的尺寸量身定制的.

sentences.en: His good manners bespoke the gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他的彬彬有礼显示他是个绅士.

sentences.en: His polite manners bespoke the gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他那彬彬有礼的举止显出他是个绅士.

sentences.en: His style of dressing bespoke great self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 他的衣着风格显得十分自信。

sentences.en: In the basement fifteen employees are busy making bespoke coats.
sentences.cn: 在地下室里，15名员工正在忙着缝制定做的外套。

sentences.en: She was young a fair , calm face, whose lines bespoke repression and even a certain strength.
sentences.cn: 她年轻, 面容娇好而沉着.但面部的神情表明她在自我克制, 甚至表现出一种力量.

sentences.en: She was young, with a fair , calm face lines bespoke repression and even a certain strength.
sentences.cn: 她年轻, 面容娇好而沉着,但面部的神情表明她在自我克制,甚至表现出一种力量.

sentences.en: the cost of development of a bespoke system
These will make the game even more bespoke to the player's match day needs.
sentences.cn: 这将使游戏更加适应玩家的需求.

sentences.en: Willow is a bespoke art consultancy company taking projects from concept to installation.
sentences.cn: 华洋轩是一家国际性艺术品顾问及制作公司.

trans.tran_en: a bespoke product, especially computer software or a piece of clothing, has been specially made for a particular customer
